css: .pricing1 a{color:#e03a3c;text-decoration:none;transition:.3s}.pricing1 a:hover{color:color-mix(in srgb,#e03a3c,transparent 25%);text-decoration:none}@keyframes php-email-form-loading{0%{transform:rotate(0)}100%{transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes pulsate-play-btn{0%{transform:scale(.6,.6);opacity:1}100%{transform:scale(1,1);opacity:0}}@media screen and (max-width:768px){[data-aos-delay]{transition-delay:0!important}}.section.pricing1,section.pricing1{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1b1b1b;padding:60px 0;scroll-margin-top:100px;overflow:clip}.section-bg.pricing1{background-color:transparent;padding:160px 0;position:relative}.pricing1.section-bg:before{content:"";background-color:#1b1b1b;position:absolute;bottom:60px;top:60px;left:0;right:0;transform:skewY(-3deg)}.section-bg .container{position:relative}@media (max-width:1199px){.section,section{scroll-margin-top:66px}}.section-title{text-align:center;padding-bottom:60px;position:relative}.section-title h2{font-size:32px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:20px;padding-bottom:20px;position:relative;text-transform:uppercase}.section-title h2:after{content:"";position:absolute;display:block;width:50px;height:3px;background:#e03a3c;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}.section-title p{margin-bottom:0}.pricing1 .pricing-item{background-color:#353535;padding:60px 40px;box-shadow:0 3px 20px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.1);height:100%;position:relative}.pricing1 h3{font-weight:600;margin-bottom:15px;font-size:20px}.pricing1 h4{font-size:48px;color:#e03a3c;font-weight:400}.pricing1 h4 sup{font-size:28px}.pricing1 h4 span{color:color-mix(in srgb,#ffffff,transparent 60%);font-size:18px}.pricing1 ul{padding:20px 0;list-style:none;color:color-mix(in srgb,#ffffff,transparent 30%);text-align:left;line-height:20px}.pricing1 ul li{padding:10px 0;display:flex;align-items:center}.pricing1 ul i{color:#059652;font-size:24px;padding-right:3px}.pricing1 ul .na{color:color-mix(in srgb,#ffffff,transparent 60%)}.pricing1 ul .na i{color:color-mix(in srgb,#ffffff,transparent 60%)}.pricing1 ul .na span{text-decoration:line-through}.pricing1 .buy-btn{color:color-mix(in srgb,#ffffff,transparent 40%);background-color:#1b1b1b;display:inline-block;padding:8px 35px 10px 35px;border-radius:4px;border:1px solid color-mix(in srgb,#ffffff,transparent 60%);transition:none;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;transition:.3s}.pricing1 .buy-btn:hover{background:#e03a3c;border-color:#e03a3c;color:#fff}.pricing1 .featured{z-index:10}.pricing1 .featured .pricing-item{background:#e03a3c}@media (min-width:992px){.pricing1 .featured .pricing-item{transform:scale(1.02,1.1)}}.pricing1 .featured h3,.pricing1 .featured h4,.pricing1 .featured h4 span,.pricing1 .featured ul,.pricing1 .featured ul .na,.pricing1 .featured ul .na i,.pricing1 .featured ul i{color:#fff}.pricing1 .featured .buy-btn{background:#e03a3c;color:#fff;border:1px solid #fff}.pricing1 .featured .buy-btn:hover{background:color-mix(in srgb,#1b1b1b,transparent 92%)}.pricing-item li i{margin-right: 5px}.pricing-item li i.fa-x{color: #fff}
